issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When Samples > Kitchen Sink is run as MobileWeb Preview in Emulator, the screen turns black and the app crashes.

Log and Trace attached.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Import Samples > KitchenSink from Titanium Studio.
2. Run as MobileWeb Preview in Emulator.

Actual Result:

Crash.

Expected Result:

Run.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: MobileWeb Preview in Emulator: KitchenSink crashes on use
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio: 2.1.0, 2.1.1.201207171343
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.GA, 2.1.1.v20120723131610
Android SDK: r20.0.1
Android SDK Platform-tools: r13
Android NDK: r8b
Android Emulator: 2.2, 2.3.3
Android Runtime: V8
KitchenSink: Samples
OS: Snow Leopard, Ubuntu 10.04, Lion 10.7.4
Android Emulator : 2.2 ; 4.1

comments.body: I was unable to reproduce this using Android SDK Platform-tools r12 or r14.

I was able to reproduce using Android SDK Tools 20.0.1 & Android SDK Platform Tools 14.
For android 2.2 & 4.1 we see a crash.
It works fine for android 2.3 ; 4.0.
Tested On:
Titanium studio : 2.1.1.201207171343
SDK version : 2.1.1.v20120723131610

QE Notes:
Android released 20.01 SDK. This is no longer available to new downloaders. If you had it, you are offered an upgrade. Thanks to Dustin for noticing this unique situation. He also reports that he can't reproduce with the update.
We are trying the refactored KS as well, as this should be the shipping version
We are seeing it (without the Android updates) on 2.2 and 2.3.3 emulator only so far.

The Sample KitchenSink crashes on Android 2.2 emulator, and is slow on the 2.3.3 emulator.

Titanium Studio: 2.1.2.201208091718
Titanium SDK: 2.1.2.v20120809183109
Android Emulator: 2.2
Android SDK: r20.0.1
OS: Mountain Lion
Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
